comments: Simmons was a really good professor who was the victim of a r a c i s t witch-hunt by Mass Comm faculty and the college, who cannot accept a black man who is their equal and colleague. Simmons really cared about his students, unlike Smith who is moral coward cowering beneath Ligouri. Bring Simmons back and fire the rest!
He is a great professor and I would take his class again

Simmons might rant a lot, but i liked his class because you could just talk about current isses, ya know, like journalists do! He doesn\'t talk ebonics, nor does he continually talk about "black issues." whoever said that might be a little to sheltered in their nice upperclass/white community to realize what real issues are.

Very easy but I learned absolutely nothing all semester. He rants about liberal propaganda all class. Someone needs to tell him Iona is a conservative Republican college, always has been and always will be. Fire this clown.

It\'s true he talks about black issues constantly, to the neglect of a lot of other journalistic issues that should be in an introductory class. But even worse is that his speaking is practically Ebonics, we students can\'t understand him, and his grammatical edits on our papers are often incorrect.

He isn\'t bad...yes he talks about black this and black that, because its a part of MASS COMMUNICATION..its ok to talk about whats going on in black society in a course like this!...i actually did learn in this class..the only bad thing is he talks A LOT thats all...work is easy just hand it in by the end of the semester & participate!

i actually really like him hes a really nice guy he doesnt care to much about deadlines for anything and doesnt make you stay the whole class time if you say 3 smart comments in discussions he will love you for the semester.
Black this, Black that, and Black the other thing. That\'s all the guy can talk about all the time.
